resources.string: In this task, you need to choose a bigger number.\n\nQuestions may be repeated,until you collect 10 points.

"Congratulations, you've completed the level! 
Did you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest number?
 After all, there are 7 days of the week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes and much more. 
In addition, the number 7 is most often the favorite number of people around the world."
Select the number of objects with more.\n\nQuestions may be repeated,until you collect 10 points.
"Congratulations, you've completed the level!\n\nKeep up the good work on level 3."
